extendedInfo.description: YourPictureClock is a fully customizable analog clock widget that allows you to choose any picture and set it as a clock on your desktop. Be creative, use pictures of your favourite characters or something to match your wallpaper.Features:Launches Alarm from the widget by default or select a custom shortcut if you are a paid user.Clock hand gallery for predefined clock handsClock face gallery for predefined clock facesSupports Transparent Images, PNG, Jpeg, etc..Browse images via gallery or file browserBrowse images via Google searchSupports Large Image sizesAutomatically resizes images to fit widget size3 Different sizes 1x1 2x2, 3x3 and 4x4 tile sizes available

reviews.title: Great update
reviews.comment: Created some great widgets using this. Dev was very helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User
